title: Best of the Program | Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz & Sen. Mike Lee | 3/8/22
description:
Sen. Ted Cruz joins Glenn to discuss President Biden bending the knee to the climate change policy to the demise of America and the critical need to become energy-independent. Rep. Steve Hopkins joins to discuss Mississippi bill SB2716, which would create an unelected quasi-governmental entity with broad powers, including eminent domain. Sen. Mike Lee joins Glenn to discuss the Utah Caucus and President Biden’s latest move against Russian oil. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
